column1:
HR001: Does your company have a Code of Conduct Policy that supports confidential grievance mechanisms for employees/subcontractors to report compliance violation(s).?

If yes, please attach.
Artifact Required: Code of Conduct Policy

Anti-Bribery and Corruption (ABAC) Policy -  If the policy is separate and not covered as part of the code of conduct policy

Whistleblower Policy -  If the policy is separate and not covered as part of the code of conduct policy

Design Elements:
1. Requirements for maintaining confidentiality of company information
2. Rules against the misuse of information
3. Requirements for appropriate gift giving/acceptance
4. Requirements for antibribery and anticorruption
5. Requirements for maintaining appropriate professional ethics
6. Whistleblower policy-Including statements around protection from retaliation
7. Requirements for employee and subcontractor policy acknowledgment
8. Noncompliance consequences
9. Rules against discrimination and harassment
10. Conflict of interest
11. Rules against attempting to prove a weakness or control gap
column3:
New Policy Text US 0121.pdf [Stage 5](file)
Integral Anti-Bribery and Corruption Policy.docx [Stage 5](file)
03-02 Employee Handbook.pdf [Stage 5](file)
Compliance Manual (updated as at 20210429).docx [Stage 5](file)
NDA signature copy 082011.pdf [Stage 5](file)
column4:
Integral Development Corporation does have a code of conduct policy that supports confidential grievance mechanisms for employees/subcontractors to report compliance violation(s) in place.

The following design elements are in place:
1. Requirements for maintaining confidentiality of company information
    New Policy Text US 0121.pdf [Stage 5] - Page 13, Section Inappropriate Conduct

2. Rules against the misuse of information
    New Policy Text US 0121.pdf [Stage 5] - Page 13, Section Inappropriate Conduct

3. Requirements for appropriate gift giving/acceptance
    Integral Anti-Bribery and Corruption Policy.docx [Stage 5] - Page 1, Section 2: Gifts and Entertainment

4. Requirements for antibribery and anticorruption
    Integral Anti-Bribery and Corruption Policy.docx [Stage 5] - Page 1, Section 1 Anti-Bribery and Corruption 

5. Requirements for maintaining appropriate professional ethics
    03-02 Employee Handbook.pdf [Stage 5] - Page 4, Section Personal Appearance and Demeanor

6. Whistleblower policy-Including statements around protection from retaliation
    Compliance Manual (updated as at 20210429).docx [Stage 5] - Page 24, Section Whistleblowing

7. Requirements for employee and subcontractor policy acknowledgment
    NDA signature copy 082011.pdf [Stage 5] - Page 1

8. Noncompliance consequences
    Compliance Manual (updated as at 20210429).docx [Stage 5] - Page 50

9. Rules against discrimination and harassment
    03-02 Employee Handbook.pdf [Stage 5] - Page 14, Section Harassment Free Environment

10. Conflict of interest
    Compliance Manual (updated as at 20210429).docx [Stage 5] - Page 42, Section Conflict of Interest 

11. Rules against attempting to prove a weakness or control gap
    Compliance Manual (updated as at 20210429).docx [Stage 5] - Page 23, Section Complaints 

Evidence referenced:
03-02 Employee Handbook.pdf [Stage 5] 
Compliance Manual (updated as at 20210429).docx [Stage 5] 
Integral Anti-Bribery and Corruption Policy.docx [Stage 5] 
NDA signature copy 082011.pdf [Stage 5] 
New Policy Text US 0121.pdf [Stage 5]

column1:
HR002: Does your company require employees to acknowledge a code of conduct? 

If yes, please describe or attach.
Artifact Required: Example of a code of conduct acknowledgement [please redact personal information].
column4:
Integral Development Corporation does require employees to acknowledge a code of conduct.

All employees must sign and acknowledge the Employee Acknowledgement and Agreement form during hiring. 

Evidence referenced:
Acknowledgement and Agreement Form.docx [Stage 5]
column5:
Integral Development Corporation does require employees to acknowledge a code of conduct.

The assessor inspected an example Employee Acknowledgement and Agreement Form and validated that all employees must sign and acknowledge this form during hiring. 

Assessor work steps: 
The assessor's comments were completed through review of the Third Party response, inquiry with Seeja Jiju, Program Manager on 07/23/2021 and inspection of evidence.

Evidence referenced:
Acknowledgement and Agreement Form.docx [Stage 5]

column1:
HR003: Does your company have a Background Check Policy that covers employees and subcontractors?

If yes, please attach.

Note: Provide a comment if local law does not permit performing any of the below check(s).
Artifact Required: Background Check Policy

Design Elements:
1. Educational check
2. Criminal check
3. If applicable, Credit check (for employees handling transactions or transactional information)
4. If applicable, Drug test (for employees handling transactions or transactional information)
5. If applicable, Fingerprint (for employees handling transactions or transactional information)
6. Criteria includes identity verification and employee right/authorization to work
7. Process to reject those who fail
8. If applicable, ongoing background re-check process (regular interval, return to work and change of role)
column4:
Integral Development Corporation does have a background check policy that covers employees and subcontractors in place.

Integral completes educational and criminal checks as part of the background check process and is documented in the Employee Handbook.
column5:
Integral Development Corporation does have a background check policy that covers employees and subcontractors in place.

Integral completes educational and criminal checks as part of the background check process but, it is not documented in the Employee Handbook. 

However, the following design elements are not in place: 
1. Educational check
2. Criminal check
7. Process to reject those who fail

The following design elements are in place:
4. If applicable, Drug test (for employees handling transactions or transactional information)
    03-02 Employee Handbook.pdf [Stage 5] - Page 1, Section: Employment Eligibility 

6. Criteria includes identity verification and employee right/authorization to work
    03-02 Employee Handbook.pdf [Stage 5] - Page 1, Section Employment Eligibility 


The following design elements are not applicable:
3. If applicable, Credit check (for employees handling transactions or transactional information)
5. If applicable, Fingerprint (for employees handling transactions or transactional information)
8. If applicable, ongoing background re-check process (regular interval, return to work and change of role)

Assessor work steps: 
The assessor's comments were completed through review of the Third Party response, inquiry with Seeja Jiju, Program Manager on 07/23/2021 and inspection of evidence.

Evidence referenced:
03-02 Employee Handbook.pdf [Stage 5]
column9: Integral's comprehensive background check policy, as noted by the Assessor, includes educational and criminal background checks.  The policy has, nevertheless, been augmented to more fully state what it does in this regard, see document attached.

column1:
HR004: Does your company perform a background check for your employees/subcontractors?
Artifact Required : Example of a completed background check for subcontractor and employee [please redact personal information]. (For WebEx validation only & do not share via the platform.)
column4: Integral Development Corporation does perform a background check for its employees/subcontractors.
column5:
Integral Development Corporation does perform a background check for its employees/subcontractors.

The assessor inspected the redacted background check example. The background check covers educational and a criminal and offense check. In addition, the background check covers SSN validation, civil upper and lower, employment report, employee credit, national sex offender registry and widescreen plus national criminal search. 

Assessor work steps: 
The assessor's comments were completed through review of the Third Party response and inspection of evidence.

Evidence referenced:
Sample background check.pdf [Stage 5]

column1: HR005: Does your company perform economic sanctions screening (e.g., OFAC and OFAC cyber-designated entities) on all employees and subcontractors?
column4:
Integral do not have offices in Economically sanctioned areas and are not hiring employees or contractors working in those areas or from those areas, therefore there is no associated risk.
(Reference: Compliance manual, Pg 44, 45))
column5:
Integral Development Corporation does not perform economic sanctions screening (e.g., OFAC and OFAC cyber-designated entities) on all employees and subcontractors.



Assessor work steps: 
The assessor's comments were completed through review of the Third Party response.
column9:
Integral do not have offices in Economically sanctioned areas and are not hiring employees or contractors working in those areas or from those areas, therefore there is no associated risk.
(Reference: Compliance manual, Pg 44, 45))

Attach compliance manual
column12: This is a requirement of our mutual customers and cannot be marked NA.

column1: HR006: Does your company comply with all laws and regulations relevant to Recruitment, Hiring Practices, Employment Law, and all National and other Laws and Regulations relevant to the services provided?
column4: Yes. Description is provided in the Employee Handbook. Integral Development Corporation does comply with all laws and regulations relevant to Recruitment, Hiring Practices, Employment Law, and all National and other Laws and Regulations relevant to the services provided.
column5:
Integral Development Corporation does comply with all laws and regulations relevant to Recruitment, Hiring Practices, Employment Law, and all National and other Laws and Regulations relevant to the services provided.



Assessor work steps: 
The assessor's comments were completed through review of the Third Party response.

column1:
HR007: Does your company require employees and subcontractors to sign a Non-Disclosure (NDA) or Confidentiality Agreement?

If yes, please attach.
Artifact Required:  Sample signed NDA or confidentiality agreement [please redact personal information]
column4: Integral Development Corporation does require employees and subcontractors to sign a Non-Disclosure (NDA) or Confidentiality Agreement.
column5:
Integral Development Corporation does require employees and subcontractors to sign a Non-Disclosure (NDA) or Confidentiality Agreement.

column1:
HR008: Does your company have an organization chart showing the names and positions of the executive leadership team, including all key employee (C-suite) personnel?

Artifact Required: Organizational Chart
column4: Integral Development Corporation does have an organization chart showing names and positions of the executive leadership team, including all key employee (C-suite) personnel in place.
column5:
